about_the_game:
2k QHD resolution.* Enhanced graphics quality thanks to higher resolution renders and animations.
In-game Walkthrough mode. It can run in two modes:
HINTS - shows hints only in the most critical scenes.
FULL - always offers the best response if it has the slightest impact on the story's development.
Achievement Guide. A section in the menu listing all achievements and how to obtain them.
11 4k wallpapers.** Some are made from in-game renders, and some are unique. Also, wallpapers are available in 2560x1440 and 1920x1080 formats.


* Works independently of your screen resolution. The image quality will always be better than in the standard edition due to the initially higher resolution of the renders.
**'Wallpapers' folder is located in the game folder. You can open the folder either through the menu section within the game or by finding it yourself on your computer. (Right-click on With Eyes Closed in your Steam library and select Manage > Browse local files.)

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs, and violence.
